fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations: New York: £202 United Airlines from Heathrow. Valid for departures November 1-30. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Skydeals, (0800 9755477, skydeals.co.uk). Los Angeles: £299 Air New Zealand from Heathrow. Valid for departures November 1 - December 19, then December 25 - March 21. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum three months. Quest Worldwide Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Hong Kong: £299 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow. Must be booked by May 6. Valid for departures until June 10. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Travelmood (08700 664556, travelmood.com). Sydney: £540 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow via Hong Kong. Must be booked by May 6, and full payment required. Valid for departures until June 13. Minimum stay seven nights, maximum one year. Airline Network (0870 234 0729, airlinenetwork.co.uk). Paris: £88.50 British Airways from Manchester. Must be booked online (£15 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures April 15 - October 30 (excluding July 15 - September 1). British Airways (ba.com, 0870 8509850). Amsterdam: £58.10 BMI British Midland from Heathrow. Must be booked on line (£10 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. BMI British Midland (flybmi.com, 0870 6070555). The pick of the rest: Seville: £69 GB Airways from Gatwick. Must be booked online by May 7 (£15 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures until October 31. No minimum stay, maximum one year. British Airways (ba.com, 0870 8509850). Montego Bay: £190 Thomson Flights charter from Manchester. Departs May 4 for 14 nights. Thomsonflights (0800 000747, thomsonflights.co.uk). Manila: £439 Gulf Air from Heathrow via Abu Dhabi or Bahrain. Must be booked by July 14 for departures until July 15. Minimum stay three days, maximum three months. Bridge the World (0870 4441716, bridgetheworld.com). Orlando: £296 Icelandair from Heathrow via Reykjavik. Valid for departures November 1 - December 14. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum 180 days. Thomas Cook (08701 111111, thomascook.com). And the rail alternative: Paris/ Brussels: £59. Lille: £55 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford. Must be booked at least 21 days before departure. No advance booking required for Saturday or Sunday same day returns or trips including a Saturday night stay. Eurostar (08705 186186, eurostar.com). NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush.
